description:
<p>Rhoslan Surgery is looking to recruit a Pharmacy Technician to join our team. <br /> As a pharmacy technician you will work alongside our team to provide specialist pharmaceutical technical services advice and direct support to our clinicians and administrative staff</p>
<p>The ability to speak Welsh is desirable for this post; English and/or Welsh speakers are equally welcome to apply.</p>

hiringOrganization.name: GP Practices - Betsi Cadwaladr University Health Board

title: Pharmacy Technician
